channel.title: CVE Feed for Cevik Informatics -- Online Payment System
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Cevik Informatics -- Online Payment System

item.title: CVE-2023-4231|2024-08-02T07:24:03.488Z -- cevik%20informatics -- online%20payment%20system
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Cevik Informatics Online Payment System allows SQL Injection.This issue affects Online Payment System: before 4.09.
